name: CBCJobs.com
overview:
CBCJobs combines traditional job search, an applicant tracking system and a social networking site, all in one! It gives job seekers ability to ‘follow’ employers and get receive updates of new jobs. It gives employers the coveted ability to notify a lot of people about new jobs practically without lifting a finger.

CBCJobs is one of the largest job search portals online. Search through thousands of jobs posted by US employers, including many Fortune 500 companies. Since its inception in 2007, CBCJobs has been growing exponentially due to its fast and friendly user interface, easy of use and a no-nonse approach to job search.

Mission

One of the primary goals of CBCJobs is to make the site job-seeker friendly and to reduce the time it takes job seekers to apply for jobs. We are one of those rare companies that actually care about the job seeker as well as the employer. We understand the frustration people go through when searching for employment, and want to make the job search process as painless as possible. Therefore, everything at CBCJobs is done with the job seeker in mind.
